Interface IImageController

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageController
public interface IImageController
Interface defining the core operations for image manipulation in the application. Provides methods for loading, saving, and managing image files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    open()
    Opens a file dialog to allow the user to select an image file and loads the selected image.
    void
    save()
    Saves the current image to its associated file path.
    void
    saveAs()
    Prompts the user to select a file path and saves the current image to the chosen location.
    void
    setImage(IImageView image)
    Associates a view with the controller for managing image display and updates.
    void
    setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    Sets the stage for this controller, allowing it to manage its UI components.

  • Method Details

    • save

      void save()
      Saves the current image to its associated file path.

    • saveAs

      void saveAs()
      Prompts the user to select a file path and saves the current image to the chosen location.

    • open

      void open()
      Opens a file dialog to allow the user to select an image file and loads the selected image.

    • setImage

      void setImage(IImageView image)
      Associates a view with the controller for managing image display and updates.
      Parameters:
      image - The IImageView instance to be associated with this controller.

    • setStage

      void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Sets the stage for this controller, allowing it to manage its UI components.
      Parameters:
      stage - The Stage instance to be managed by this controller.
